item.title: Any1? can help me
item.dc:creator: @wicked_destiny wicked destiny
item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

hello

i added this to case 185
i made it work but it only gives bow when i make 5 or 10
why doesnt this work?

second question how do i make “make X amout”
same as cook X

[code]case 34185:
if(playerLevel[9] >= 5) {
deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1);
addItem(54, 1);
addSkillXP(25, 9);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a fletching level of 5 to make this bow.”);
}
closeInterface();
break;
case 34184:
if(playerLevel[9] >= 5) {
deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 5);
addItem(54, 5);
addSkillXP(125, 9);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a fletching level of 5 to make this bow.”);
}
closeInterface();
break;
case 34183:
if(playerLevel[9] >= 5) {
deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 10);
addItem(54, 10);
addSkillXP(250, 9);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a fletching level of 5 to make this bow.”);
}
closeInterface();
break;code]

[/code]
